properties.description: This Pipeline generates the underlying datasets for Risk Navigator

activities.name: SP-Pipeline_Successful
activities.description: Mark pipeline as successful.

activities.name: SP-Activity_Failed_05
activities.description: This activity marks failure of EP-DBT_write_offs_vendor_invoices activity

activities.name: EP-DBT_write_offs_vendor_invoices
activities.description: This activity perform DBT processing for both write_offs and vendor_invoices.

activities.name: SP-Activity_Failed_03
activities.description: This activity logs the failure of the IF-NotAllTriggersExists activity.

value.value: Failed, Not all the dependent Triggers found.

activities.name: LU-Metadata_write_offs_vendor_invoices
activities.description: This activity fetches the metadata for write-offs and vendor invoices KRIs by fetching metadata based on input parent id.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where parent_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.parent_id}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: FE-DeleteTriggers
activities.description: This activity deletes the dependency triggers for next clean run check

activities.name: IF-EngineeringTriggerExists
activities.description: Check if triggers exists and delete them if exist for next clean run

ifTrueActivities.name: DL-EngineeringTrigger
ifTrueActivities.description: Delete trigger files for next clean run

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess08
ifTrueActivities.description: Activity logs success of DL-EngineeringTrigger activity.

ifTrueActivities.name: CP-ReraiseError02
ifTrueActivities.description: Make pipeline fail in case of error

activities.name: SP-Pipeline_Failed
activities.description: MArk pipeline as failed

activities.name: EP-DBT_batch_expirations
activities.description: This activity performs DBT processing for batch_expirations

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess03
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the IF-NotAllTriggersExists Activity

value.value: Successful, Found all the dependent Triggers.

activities.name: SP-Activity_Success_05
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the EP-DBT_write_offs_vendor_invoices Activity

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: Make an audit log entry for pipe execution start

activities.name: SP-Activity_Success_07
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the EP-DBT_Batch_Expiration activity.

activities.name: SP-Activity_Failed_07
activities.description: This activity logs the failure of EP-DBT_batch_expirations activity

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: Fetch the dependent records for the input parent id to check dependencies are loaded before proceeding main activity of DBT runs for ML output tables.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where dependent_id = '@{pipeline().parameters.parent_id}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: FE-Metadata
activities.description: Loop through each of the dependency record to check trigger file existence and maintain count of dependencies.

ifTrueActivities.name: SV-Count_Files_Temp
ifTrueActivities.description: Maintain the count in temp to use in next iteration

ifTrueActivities.name: SV-Count_Files
ifTrueActivities.description: Increment the dependent file count by 1

activities.name: GM-TriggerFiles
activities.description: Check if trigger file exists

activities.name: IF-NotAllTriggersExists
activities.description: Check if all dependent tables have been loaded since last run by comparing trigger file counts with dependencies count from metadata.

activities.name: LU-Metadata_DBT_batch_expirations
activities.description: This activity fetches the metadata for DBT processing of batch expirations using app name and dataset group inputs. This is dependent on earlier completed models of write offs and vendor invoices residing in different DBT project.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and dataset_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: FailureEmailSender1
activities.description: This activity triggers email when all triggers are not found.

activities.name: SuccessEmailSender
activities.description: This activity triggers the Successful completion of the Audit Advanced Analytics Prediction Models generation for ML Consumption

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess06
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the LU-Metadata_DBT_batch_expirations Activity

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed06
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata_DBT_batch_expirations activity.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess04
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the LU-Metadata_write_offs_vendor_invoices Activity

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed04
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata_write_offs_vendor_invoices activity.

activities.name: SP-Activity_Failed_02
activities.description: This activity logs the failure of the FE-Metadata activity.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess02
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the FE-Metadata Activity

activities.name: SP-Activity_Failed_01
activities.description: This activity logs the failure of the FE-Metadata activity.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess01
activities.description: This activity Logs success of the LU-Metadata Activity
